description: The QuickCalc is a tool which allows you to quickly perform some basic day to day functions.  It is made up of 6 different calculators which are useful while shopping, and also when some basic units of measure need to be converted to different standards.   1.  Price Compare – Calculates the best value of an item based on quantity, units, and price. 2.  Discount Calculator – Calculates the price of an item minus a discount plus the tax. 3.  Convert Temperature – Converts a given temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius and vice versa. 4.  Convert Weight – Converts a given weight to different weight units such as gram, kilogram, ton, ounce, and pound. 5.  Convert Length & Distance – Converts a given length or distance to a different unit such as millimeters, centimeters, meters, kilometers, inches, feet, yard, mile, nautical mile. 6.  Convert Shoe Size – Converts a shoe size from a given size standard to a different standard such as US, UK, EU, and Japan.
